# Boxen Plot


# Load data: diamonds

```{r, echo=FALSE}

# Load data
df <- read.csv("archetypes/diamonds.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
clarity_ranking <-c("I1", "SI2", "SI1", "VVS2", "VVS1", "IF", "VS2", "VS1")  
df
```

# Use python package 'seaborn' to show a boxen plot carat among diamonds clarity

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=13, fig.height=7}

sns$set(style="whitegrid")  
 
  
p1<-sns$boxenplot(x="clarity", y="carat",  
              color="b",  order=clarity_ranking,
              scale="linear", data=df) 

plt$show()
plt$savefig("diamonds.svg")
```

```{r, out.width="100%", fig.align="center"}

plt <- "diamonds.svg"
knitr::include_graphics(plt, dpi=72)

```
